TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OpenFileDialog extends Microsoft.Win32.FileDialog

Docs.summary: Represents a common dialog box that allows a user to specify a filename for one or more files to open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The following figure shows an for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winvista](~/includes/tlasharptla-winvista-md.md)]. ![Open dialog box](~/add/media/dialogboxesoverviewfigure2.png "Open dialog box") Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location. These links are called custom places. Use the property to set this list of links. ## XAML Text Usage You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples The following example shows how to create an that contains a default file name and extension type. [!code-csharp[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)] [!code-vb[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/window1.xaml.vb#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CheckPermissionsToShowDialog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an option indicating whether allows users to select multiple files.
Docs.value: if multiple selections are allowed; otherwise, . The default is .
Docs.permission: to change the dialog user interface behavior. Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream OpenFile() cil managed

Docs.summary: Opens a read-only stream for the file that is selected by the user using .
Docs.returns: A new that contains the selected file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The file is opened with read-only permission (<xref:System.IO.FileMode.Open>, <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Read>, and <xref:System.IO.FileShare.Read>), whether or not the Read Only checkbox is checked in the dialog. Because the file is opened without the ability to overwrite or write to the file, an application can safely load a file while executing within partial trust restrictions.
If more than one file is selected, the first selected file is opened.

Docs.exception: No files were selected in the dialog.
Docs.permission: to create a file stream. Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream[] OpenFiles() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an array that contains one read-only stream for each file selected by the user using .
Docs.returns: An array of multiple new objects that contain the selected files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each file is opened with read-only permission (<xref:System.IO.FileMode.Open>, <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Read>, and <xref:System.IO.FileShare.Read>), whether or not the Read Only checkbox is checked in the dialog. Because each file is opened without the ability to overwrite or write to the file, an application can safely load one or more files while executing within partial trust restrictions.

Docs.exception: No files were selected in the dialog.
Docs.permission: to create a file stream array. Associated enumeration:

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the read-only check box displayed by is selected.
Docs.value: if the checkbox is selected; otherwise, . The default is .

block.para: This class is sealed, so you cannot override this method.
